entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'famous'.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Harry's mother, who was killed by a powerful curse.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Harry's father, who was also killed by the curse.

entities.name: house
entities.description: The family home that was destroyed by the curse.

entities.name: curse
entities.description: A powerful and evil spell that killed Harry's parents and destroyed their house.

entities.name: mckinnons
entities.description: A family of witches and wizards who were killed by the same person who tried to kill Harry's parents.

relationships.description: The same person who tried to kill Harry's parents also killed the McKinnon family.
